mapper.select:
SELECT TSRPB.RULEID, TSRPB.SIMPLERULEPROPERTYPARAM, TSRPB.PARAMKEY, TSRPB.PARAMVALUE, TSRPB.PARAMVALUEORDERED FROM RU_RULE_PRO_BYTE TSRPB WHERE
AND TSRPB.RULEID = #{ruleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RU_RULE_PRO_BYTE ( RULEID, SIMPLERULEPROPERTYPARAM, PARAMKEY, PARAMVALUE, PARAMVALUEORDERED ) VALUES ( #{ruleId}, #{simpleRulePropertyParam}, #{paramKey}, #{paramValue}, #{paramValueOrdered} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM RU_RULE_PRO_BYTE TSRPB WHERE
AND TSRPB.RULEID = #{ruleId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ru_rule_pro_byte TSRPB
SIMPLERULEPROPERTYPARAM = #{simpleRulePropertyParam,javaType=com.tx.component.rule.model.SimpleRulePropertyParam},
PARAMKEY = #{paramKey,javaType=java.lang.String},
PARAMVALUE = #{paramValue,javaType=[B},
PARAMVALUEORDERED = #{paramValueOrdered,javaType=int},
WHERE TSRPB.RULEID = #{ruleId}
